attributes.action: allow the British people to vote on a no confidence motion on Speaker Martin, we have no faith in him whatsoever.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the rules of Parliament do not allow votes of no confidence on the Speaker, we would like the opportunity to publicly vote on his incompetence and willingness to cover up the MP's expences from the general public.  We have no confidence in him whatsoever, sack him.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
